thread.title: Lad gets 'biggest c*** in Kavos' tattooed by privates: 'Everyone I've slept with says it'
thread.title_full: Lad gets 'biggest c*** in Kavos' tattooed by privates: 'Everyone I've slept with says it'

title: Lad gets 'biggest c*** in Kavos' tattooed by privates: 'Everyone I've slept with says it'
text:
TRUTH?: Luke was adamant the girls were being honest Bad celebrity fan tattoos Wednesday, 1st June 2016 We've dug out some of the worst fan tattoos. This shows just how far those superfans will go to show how much they adore their favourite celebs. 1 / 57 Caters A Miley Cyrus fan is getting his tattoos of the twerking pop star removed as he claims they're ruining his love life “They have all actually said it, I'm so proud of him” Luke's friend 
One of his friends backed up his story, saying: "They have all actually said it, I'm so proud of him." 
But it soon transpired they may not have meant he had the biggest appendage but that he was the biggest tool in Kavos. 
It didn't seem to dampen his spirits, though, and he showed off the cringe design happily after he'd had it done. 
He said: "Are people gonna be annoyed with me back home? No, only my dad, my mum, my grandma, my step mum – just my family." 
CHANNEL 5 ANGRY: Luke said his family wouldn't be too pleased The ultimate celebrity tattoos Wednesday, 18th May 2016 From One Directioners Liam Payne and Harry Styles to Rita Ora, we've got the ultimate catalogue of celebrity tattoos... 1 / 47 Getty Cheryl shows off her new breast tattoo in plunging playsuit at Cannes 
Elsewhere in the episode, there was a classic camel on a toe and a list of names on a bum. 
It's good to see us Brits can keep it classy in Kavos… 
Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink continues next Thursday at 10pm on Channel 5. Related articles
